content: प्रयोगः {@--1@} Use, application, employment; as in शब्दप्रयोग; अयं शब्दो भूरिप्रयोगः -अल्पप्रयोगः ‘this word is generally or rarely used’. {@--2@} A usual form, general usage. {@--3@} Hurling, throwing, discharging (<ab>opp.</ab> संहारः); प्रयोगसंहारविभक्तमंत्रं <ls>R. 5. 57.</ls> {@--4@} Exhibition, performance, representation (dramatic), acting; देव प्रयोगप्रधानं हि नाट्यशास्त्रं <ls>M. 1</ls>; नाटिका न प्रयोगतो दृष्टा <ls>Ratn. 1</ls> ‘not seen acted on the stage’. {@--5@} Practice, experimental portion (of a subject); (<ab>opp.</ab> शास्त्र ‘theory’); तदत्रभवानिमं मां च शास्त्रे प्रयोगे च विमृशतु <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Course of procedure, ceremonial form. {@--7@} An act, action. {@--8@} Recitation, delivery. {@--9@} Beginning, commencement. {@--10@} A plan, contrivance, device, scheme. {@--11@} A means, instrument. {@--12@} Consequence, result. {@--13@} Combination, connection. {@--14@} Addition. {@--15@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A usual form. {@--16@} Offering, presenting. {@--17@} ({%a%}) Principal, loan bearing interest. ({%b%}) Lending money on usury. {@--18@} Appointment. {@--19@} A sacred text or authority. {@--20@} A cause, motive. {@--21@} An example. {@--22@} Application of magic, magical rites. {@--23@} A horse.
